item.description:
October 15, 2012. 5:45 pm to 9:00 pm
Crowne Plaza Hotel
100 Berlin Road. Cromwell, CT

Register and Learn More at http://www.ctreia.com/events.php?a=v&i=493

Streaming Live ... from his Office ... Zack Childress.

Zack Childress is truly the King of Wholesaling and Business Automation. He has cracked the code on how to automate your real estate marketing process (or any business for that matter) so that you can go about living your life while making more money than you know what to do with.

Zack has also discovered SIX little known ways to wholesale real estate so that you can profit from almost every lead you generate.

Wholesaling is perfect for beginners... low risk, low out-of-pocket cost. It is also perfect for experienced investors ... after all you can't buy every deal in town!

You Will Learn
* New technology he is using in his office ... with just a click of a link
* Why wholesaling the OLD way doesn't work any more
* What his office looks like ... so you can duplicate it
* How marketing automation can help you make more money with ANY real estate strategy you choose
* Why No Money Down strategies can be the most effective way to buy
* What ONE THING you need to do that will exponentially increase your chance of success
* PLUS Hear from local investors sharing Real Deals and Real Profits right here in Connecticut.

group.name: CT REIA - The Connecticut Real Estate Investors Assn. Meetup

item.name: CT REIA October 2012 Monthly Meeting: Low-Risk, Low-Cost House Buying
